In the Great Lakes region, the drivers congratulated the Father ' s Day of Defence.Today is 14:30.06 photos
In anticipation of the Day of Defence of the Father ' s Office, the officers of the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation, Velikolukski, together with students of the Semi-Gymnasia, carried out an action in the village of Pereszhengino. As part of the action, children congratulated male drivers and gave them gifts. Staff members continued their action on the roads of the Greatdistrict
The Great Cadet Police conducted a lesson of courage.Today is 14:00.04 photos
Patriotism is not just a word, it is a vital position deeply entrenched in the heart of every true defender of Rodina. That's what the veterans of the Russian Ministry of Internal Affairs were talking about in the city of the Great Lookie Police Lieutenant Colonel in resignation.Gennady Marchenkovand Major of PoliceAndrei Streetswhen they conducted the " Lessons of courage " for cadetsschools
Strip closure: The great Lukas were hit by an accident on Pushkin Street.Today is 13:15.0
There was another accident in the Great Lukas. Two lungs ran into Pushkin Street.

The cars closed one of the stripes. Drivers are waiting for DPS officers.
The magnificent has delivered products and cosmetics from the store.Today is 13:00.0
On 21 February, a representative of the store addressed the police. He told the guards that, on 12 February, an unidentified man from the shop in Voxal Street stole a cosmetical bone, a face bouster, baby food, apples and a farsh.

The guards have identified the identity of the malicious. She was born in 1986. The woman was never tried before. Criminal proceedings have been initiated.
The details of the Great Luka accident were known.Today is 12:350
Today, at the crossroads of Lenin and the street of Siberians, Daihatsu, a woman born in 1947, on a secondary road, did not pass the Chevrolet car under the direction of a woman born in 1995.

As a result of the accident, both drivers were taken to a foster home where they were given the necessary medical assistanceassistance
Family traditions in a family enterpriseToday is 12:00.021 photos
Family as the foundation on which the house is built. And this foundation must be strong and reliable. It has been noted that, from how happy a person is in his family, his whole life is so successful.

The importance of supporting and strengthening family ties shares andleadership
The Pskov region has entered the three winners All Russian touristsIt's 11:30.0
In St. Petersburg, final III of the Russian Travel Awards Prize was held. It aims to develop and promote domestic tourism and the hospitality industry.

Total finals.
Photoact: Two cars ran into Lenin's Prospect in the Great LukasToday is 11:00.0
The great Lukas at the crossroads of Lenin and the streets of Siberians were hit by an accident. Two cars crashed.

DPS and ambulance staff are deployedassistance
About 80 public areas Pskov Region will vote on FCSIt's 10:30.0
Preparation of a rating vote on the selection of public areas for improvement as part of the federal project " Comfort Urban Environment " (FICSA) of the Governor of Pskov RegionMichael Wedernikovdiscussed with her.Deputy Circ

info.title: In the Great Lakes region, the drivers congratulated the Father ' s Day of Defence.
info.short_text: In anticipation of the Day of Defence of the Father ' s Office, the officers of the Department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the Russian Federation, Velikolukski, together with students of the Semi-Gymnasia, carried out an action in the village of Pereszhengino. As part of the action, children congratulated male drivers and gave them gifts. Staff members continued their activities on the roads of the Greater Town Region.

info.title: The Great Cadet Police conducted a lesson of courage.
info.short_text: Patriotism is not just a word, it is a vital position deeply entrenched in the heart of every true defender of Rodina. This is what was said by the veterans of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia on the town of Great Lucy, Lieutenant Colonel of the Police at the resignation of Gennadi Marchenkov and Major Andrei Streltsov, when they conducted " Lessons of courage " for the cadets of the Cadet School.

info.title: Strip closure: The great Lukas were hit by an accident on Pushkin Street.
info.short_text:
There was another accident in the Great Lukas. Two lungs ran into Pushkin Street.

The cars closed one of the stripes. Drivers are waiting for DPS officers.

info.title: The magnificent has delivered products and cosmetics from the store.
info.short_text:
On 21 February, a representative of the store addressed the police. He told the guards that, on 12 February, an unidentified man from the shop in Voxal Street stole a cosmetical bone, a face bouster, baby food, apples and a farsh.

The guards have identified the identity of the malicious. She was born in 1986. The woman was never tried before. Criminal proceedings have been initiated.

info.title: The details of the Great Luka accident were known.
info.short_text:
Today, at the crossroads of Lenin and the street of Siberians, Daihatsu, a woman born in 1947, on a secondary road, did not pass the Chevrolet car under the direction of a woman born in 1995.

As a result of the accident, both drivers were taken to a foster home, where they were provided with the necessary medical care diagrams

info.title: Family traditions in a family enterprise

Family as the foundation on which the house is built. And this foundation must be strong and reliable. It has been noted that, from how happy a person is in his family, his whole life is so successful.

The importance of supporting and strengthening family ties also shares numerical leadership

In St. Petersburg, final III of the Russian Travel Awards Prize was held. It aims to develop and promote domestic tourism and the hospitality industry.

The finals of the competition were numerical.
